name: Jewelry Roll
description:
***This item was recently featured at Kingman Museum's "Inspired by Nature, Made in Michigan" Jewelry Trunk Show ***


This item is a great way to organize your jewelry. Use it while you are traveling or keep it in your drawer at home.

The jewelry roll includes:

three hang ribbons for necklaces
three open pockets to keep necklaces safe
three open pockets
one ring tube (could be used for watches and bracelets)
one zippered pouch
one elastic closure

The larger three pockets, the back of the ring tube, and the zipper pouch are all lined with a very soft fabric to keep from scratching your jewelry.

The whole piece when open measures about 12"x8"

This would make a great gift for bridesmaids, mothers, sisters, daughters and girlfriends.

Please visit my blog for fabric options.

http://makinglifewonderful.blogspot.com/p/jewelry-rolls.html

Please allow three weeks to create and ship. I ship USPS.
